thread.title: Manheim Twp. coach approves PIAA football move
thread.title_full: Manheim Twp. coach approves PIAA football move

title: Manheim Twp. coach approves PIAA football move
text:
Manheim Twp. coach approves PIAA football move 
Updated: 
Posted by: Jason Bristol 
MANHEIM -- Count Manheim Township head coach Mark Evans as a supporter of the PIAA's new football classification system. 
"It's exciting news," said Evans before practice on Wednesday. "I think the ultimate goal with the classification is to get more teams into the playoffs." 
The Blue Streaks meet Cedar Crest on Friday Night Rivals. 
The PIAA board voted 26-4 in favor of expanding its classifications from four to six; the move will allow teams to play schools with more similar enrollments. 
In addition, the PIAA also expanded classifications for baseball, basketball and softball; as well as volleyball, soccer, field hockey and lacrosse.
